title: At the Restaurant
description: A customer orders food at a restaurant
transcript:
Waiter: Good evening! Welcome to Mario's Restaurant. Here is the menu.
Customer: Thank you. I need a few minutes to decide.
Waiter: Of course. Would you like something to drink?
Customer: Yes, I'll have a glass of orange juice, please.
Waiter: Sure. Are you ready to order food?
Customer: Yes. I'd like the pasta with tomato sauce as a starter. And for the main course, I'll have grilled chicken with vegetables.
Waiter: Excellent choice. Would you like any dessert?
Customer: Maybe later. Thank you.
Waiter: Your food will be ready in fifteen minutes.

questions.question: What does the customer order to drink?
The starter is pasta with tomato sauce.
